title: What am i doing with my life...
body:
After having a 30 + day break from league i have decided to get back on the high horse and went straight into ranked on my smurf. The games have actually been pre good. Currently 6 - 2. Sad thing is im actually rekting plebs and i dont even know what is OP/ what the hype is currently in the game etc. Why am i telling you guys this? Because that 6 - 2 score is what is making me addicted to playing those last 2 games when ranked comes back up.

help

League addiction is back..

replies.body: Just a rule of thumb. If you don't get matched with golds regularly, you don't have gold MMR, same goes for plat with plat MMR.

I did get matched with golds every game

You just wont believe me cause ur mad that 1. i hit gold

2. i had gold mmr on a silver 3 account as well 

stay mad and git gud xoxox

> [{quoted}](name=Molendo,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=uJBiG3o1,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2015-01-22T07:06:38.538+0000)
>
> I did get matched with golds every game
> 
> You just wont believe me cause ur mad that 1. i hit gold
> 
> 2. i had gold mmr on a silver 3 account as well 
> 
> stay mad and git gud xoxox

woooow. do kids really brag about gold? hahahahahahhaa

no im not bragging?

Us goldies are average at the game anyway

> [{quoted}](name=Molendo,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=uJBiG3o1,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2015-01-22T07:06:38.538+0000)

>

> 
> 2. i had gold mmr on a silver 3 account as well 
> 
> stay mad and git gud xoxox

Why would I be mad that you are 600 elo below me?

what rank is your smurf? 
Also there is nothing wrong with playing some LoL, just do whatever it is you need to do before coming on, if it stops you from doing things remove LoL from your start button and desktop, clear your history, and slap yourself in the face whenever you want to do anything LoL related and are yet to fulfill your duties.

Was silver 3 last season but had gold mmr lel.

Im hoping for at least silver 1 placement ^,^

> [{quoted}](name=Molendo,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=uJBiG3o1,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-01-21T18:35:27.604+0000)

>

What's up with this sudden trend of people bull%%%%ting about mmr?

How am i bull%%%%ting?

I know a lot of ppl lie about that but im not.

Stop being jelly
